wikipedia_page.main: John Sherwood (1913 - 2002) is an author of fiction. He wrote the cozy Celia Grant Horticultural mystery series, amongst others.

response: * John Sherwood (bishop) (died 1494), Bishop of Durham, diplomat
* John Sherwood (comic creator), see Les Pretend
* John Sherwood (director) (1903–1959), American director of The Monolith Monsters
* John Sherwood-Kelly (1880–1931), officer, recipient of the Victoria Cross
